content:
282 Ron DeSantis
:
It opened my eyes as well especially because what Disney did was legal; that is, US law allowed firing Americans and then having the Americans train their foreign-worker replacements.  Bad policy. MEATBALL posted 3 days ago by PiratePatriotParrot 5 comments award share report block Ron DeSantis @RonDeSantis • 3d It opened my eyes as well especially because what Disney did was legal; that is, US law allowed firing Americans and then having the Americans train their foreign-worker replacements.  Bad policy. CommanderGub @CommanderGub • 3d @RonDeSantis Disney firing all of their IT was the thing that opened my eyes to the absolute treachery of H1B abuse and offshoring. Never forget that betrayal and keep fighting for American workers @RonDeSantis ! Thank you!!!
